active_incidents.title: Users may be experiencing issues loading threads and sending messages.

notes.body:
Some users may be experiencing issues loading threads and sending messages.

We're seeing improvements and we're actively monitoring to ensure user impact is fully resolved. We'll share more updates as we have more information. 

We're sorry for the disruption this may have caused.

active_incidents.title: Thread search results may be returning as blank for users.

notes.body:
Thread search results may be returning as blank for users. 

We're currently investigating the issue and will share more information as soon as possible. We apologize for any disruptions this may have caused.
